definition: Maitreya/the Bodhisattva that will be the next to come after Shakyamuni Buddha
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: This is Maitreya, the Buddha of the future.
sentences.chinese: 這是彌勒佛，也就是未來佛。

sentences.english: Maitreya is a widely-believed bodhisattva in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 彌勒佛被廣大民衆認爲是中國文化中的菩薩。

sentences.english: Inside the first hall is a 200-year-old Maitreya Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 在第一個殿裏有一尊200年曆史的彌勒佛。

sentences.english: I AM Maitreya, having come to you.
sentences.chinese: 我是彌勒佛，來到你的身旁。

sentences.english: The belief in Maitreya has a long history in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，對於彌勒佛的信仰有着很長的歷史。
